ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: SCHOLARSHIP APPLICATION AN APPLICATION FOR SCHOLARSHIP MUST CONTAIN, IN AS MUCH DETAIL AS POSSIBLE, THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION: 1.) A PERSONAL BIOGRAPHY, INCLUDING INFORMATION REGARDING EDUCATIONAL BACKGROUND, PREVIOUS AND PRESENT EMPLOYMENT, PERSONAL INTERESTS AND GOALS; 2.) DESCRIPTION OF THE PROGRAMS THAT YOU PLAN TO ATTEND, A COPY OF THE LETTER OF ACCEPTANCE TO THE PROGRAM AND ITEMIZED ESTIMATE OF THE COST OF THE PROGRAM; 3.) NAMES, ADDRESSES AND PHONE NUMBERS OF THREE PROMINENT LOCAL INDIVIDUALS WHO WILL GIVE RECOMMENDATIONS AS TO YOUR PERSONAL BACKGROUND AND FUTURE PROFESSIONAL ABILITY; 4.) TO WHAT EXTENT YOU WILL PERSONALLY CONTRIBUTE MONETARILY TOWARD THE COMPLETION OF THE PROGRAMS THAT YOU WISH TO ATTEND; 5.) COPIES OF ALL TRANSCRIPTS OF PROGRAMS YOU PREVIOUSLY ATTENDED INCLUDING HIGH SCHOOL. ALL INFORMATION SHOULD BE SUBMITTED IN TYPED FORM WITH ALL PERTINENT QUESTIONS ANSWERED.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: PAGE 10, PART XIV, LINE 2(D) SCHOLARSHIP INFORMATION DUE TO THE LIMITED AMOUNT OF INVESTMENT REVENUES ANTICIPATED OVER THE NEXT ONE AND ONE-HALF YEARS, THE AMOUNT OF FUNDS RESERVED FOR SCHOLARSHIPS WILL BE LIMITED. ALL SCHOLARSHIPS WILL BE GIFTS TO SEALY I.S.D. GRADUATES IN AMOUNTS OF $500 TO $1,000 PER SEMESTER FOR ACCREDITED JUNIOR COLLEGES AND FOUR-YEAR UNIVERSITIES. MONIES ARE TO BE EXPENDED FOR BOOKS, TUITION, ROOM AND BOARD. SEALY I.S.D. WILL BE INFORMED OF THE AVAILABILITY OF GIFTS FOR STUDENTS. THERE WILL BE NO CATEGORIES OF SCHOLARSHIP BENEFIT. ALL STUDENTS WILL BE CONSIDERED FOR SCHOLARSHIP REGARDLESS OF RACE, COLOR OR CREED. ALL CANDIDATES WILL BE CONSIDERED REGARDLESS OF EMPLOYMENT OR ECONOMIC STATUS. THERE ARE APPROXIMATELY 100 125 GRADUATES OF SEALY I.S.D. EACH YEAR. EACH STUDENT WILL BE ASKED TO SUBMIT AN APPLICATION FOR EACH SEMESTER OF SCHOOL THAT INCLUDES THE MOST RECENT ACADEMIC TRANSCRIPT. A COPY OF SUCH APPLICATION IS ENCLOSED WITHIN THIS FILING.
